questions.question: So for me today, if I wanted to look at poverty, how would I help?
So what do you think about the inequality of suffering that we have to think about?
When you think about the existential risks that are facing our civilization, what's before us?
Agriculture, everything that came, the Industrial Revolution, cars, planes, the internet, that level of innovation you think is inevitable?
Last question, if you yourself could eradicate one problem from the world, what would that problem be?
